Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory199.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hey! Hey, Commandant! Here, here!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why a theme park?', 3: '7', 4: 'So, is this where we start our date?', 5: '9'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It doesn't count as a date if we remain at the base.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's right! It's our first date!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'True to herself, Nanami sprints up, down, and around the amusement park with manic energy. First, to the left, knocking on a ticket machine long out of service.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Then she runs off to the right, pulling at an ominous-looking statue...', 4: '1'}
{3: '...Off the pedestal.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: "As the statue's arm cracks and breaks, Nanami drops to the ground, still clutching the severed appendage. Luckily, for Constructs, such falls are no big deal.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She quickly picks herself up and skips her way back to you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Let's conduct research on humans and date at the same time!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What even is this "research on humans"?', 3: '28', 4: 'Too close!', 5: '29'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Exactly what it says on the tin! I want to know everything about humans.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Without you noticing, Nanami comes in close enough to kiss, if either of you takes one more step.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Too close? Relaaax, Nanami doesn't explode.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "In short, Nanami should take advantage of today's date to collect data on real human emotions. Don't forget to help her, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'How can I help?', 3: '35', 4: "I'll do my best.", 5: '36'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'You can help by going on every single ride with Nanami!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Let's start our theme park date!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory196.png'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "First stop: the carousel! I heard that if you ride it long enough, you'll lift off!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant, are you ready to flyyyyy...? Oh... did the flight mechanism break?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory188.png', 3: 'Hahahaha! That ghost has a funny face!'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "No worries, we'll be moving on to stop number two, the haunted house! But things like ghosts aren't realistic at all...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hahahaha! That ghost looks funny!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory194.png'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Next stop is the roller coaster. The rail would break in the middle to make it more exciting!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Wah! We're fallinggg!!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory199.png'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'They were all so fun even though they broke down halfway!', 4: '1'}
{2: "Eh, it's alright.", 3: '53', 4: 'I think this is an abandoned amusement park.', 5: '55'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '...Are you bored?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Commandant just doesn't look excited. Is it boring?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hmm, looks like I do need to do more research before the date.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You prepared this?', 3: '59', 4: "Why don't we try collecting data another way?", 5: '61'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Yeah, I came early to sweep the grounds of Corrupted and then asked Lucia and the gang for help with repairs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Another way? Nah, this is the only way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'A-ny-way, Nanami will not be disheartened! Look forward to our next date, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
